cells.data:
Monthly roundtable questions from SE’s to PM's

Multiple Audio Support - engineering team beginning to plan for this.
     SDK team already working on this

Dynamic Ingest creates more content than with previous Ingest
     Dynamic Ingest (Bolt) may help with this problem, but this is a long way off.
     On-demand packaging of video - not done at ingestion
     SE needs to manually delete masters. 

Display Thumbnail Previews Plugin
     thumbnails are not available from VC.
     Can we generate thumbnails?
     Right now, can show thumbnails that are provided thru ingestion.
     jsThumb can create these on the client side. We haven’t decided how to handle this.
     
Thumbnail Preview (cont) - 
     create and host this in Studio
     supported if client creates and hosts externally.
     this is a blocker to migrating to the new player.
     hover over playhead, see thumbnail preview.
     no product ties or roadmap for 2016 , but can do this as a 1 off with a client-side plugin.
     David M would like to do this for AMC (already doing this for a few customers)
     The player supports it, but need to do some customization on the backend to set up film strip and images.

360 Video
     just video that looks weird. there is an open source plugin, but not current.
     need someone to build a plugin to handle this.

captions and tvOS
     now supported with WebVTT captions

player level geo restriction
     still on roadmap
     shouldn’t we use the playback api and the policy key?

studio - video level ad turn on
     still on list. In CMS API and adding it to Playback API

Playlists out of beta?
     coming soon. need to work out a few more bugs.
     Andrew will check on status of this.
     on roadmap, more layouts for the player and playlists (later this year)

Gallery
     all existing templates will be localized. just provide library for each language.
     localized all templates.
     Japanese will deliver mid January.
     European languages will be supported as requested. the infrastructure is there.

Studio
     media sharing
     remote assets
     retranscode has some limitations
          ingested batch old studio, it may or may not work depending on where the master is located.
          master may not be accessible via ZenCoder.
          may look at retranscode with remote assets.
               SE’s tell customers to save master on S3 to save on cost, but then can’t use retranscode.
               S3 is cheaper than Akamai storage.
          retranscode is not available if not saving the master or setting the highest rendition as master.
     starting work on advanced search


CMS API
     remote assets easier
